title: Luke Bryan’s Wife, Caroline Fills In For Lunchbox + 90’s TV Show Draft + Raymundo Asks Bobby For A Wedding Favor
itunes:title: Luke Bryan’s Wife, Caroline Fills In For Lunchbox + 90’s TV Show Draft + Raymundo Asks Bobby For A Wedding Favor
description:
Luke Bryan’s wife, Caroline hangs out with us in studio. She shares what she loves about her husband and the one thing that annoys her about him. She also talks about her charity causes, Instagram pranks and family life. Plus, we draft our favorite 90’s TV Shows and Raymundo wants his engagement photos taken at Bobby’s house!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
